Package com.example.kit

Class ItemListController

java.lang.Object
com.example.kit.ItemListController
All Implemented Interfaces:
androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver
public class ItemListController extends Object implements androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver
A controller class for the ItemListFragment, managing the ItemFirestoreAdapter with queries and filtering.
